title: C210 Manage Student Info & Documents | Yönerge
text: Künye Bilgisini Göster Units in Charge Owner: Student Resources(ÖK) Responsibles: Suppliers Input: Supplier in Charge: Customers Output: Customer Served: Performance Indicators Reporting Period Instruction Letter Procedure Form Instruction Letter for Student Discipline (ISR-C210-01) Disciplinary Procedure of Students ( PSR-C210-0101) Intruction Letter for Semester Leave of Absence and Enrollment Cancellation (ISR-C210-02) Procedure For Semester Leave of Absence (PSR-C210-0201) Procedure For Enrollment Cancellation (PSR-C210-0202) Instruction Letter For Keeping Students Information and Documents / Updating/ Preparation of the Student Documents (ISR-C210-04) Procedure For Keeping And Updating Student Information (PSR-C210-0401) Procedure For Preparation Of Student Certificate (PSR-C210-0402) Procedure For Preparation Of Student Identification Cards (PSR-C210-0403) Procedure For Preparation Of Pass Card (PSR-C210-0404) Instruction Letter for Study Visa and Residence Permit (ISR-C210-05) Procedure For Study Visa And Residence Permit (PIRO-C430-0201) Language English
